_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
December 22nd, 1:35 PM
Good afternoon skiers and riders! We have snow in the forecast! Tomorrow, expect cloudy skies, temps will rise slightly, mid/high 20s at the base and low 20s at the summit, light snow showers expected to begin around noon, delivering 1-2". Tomorrow you'll find similar snow conditions, machine grooming on 38 of our trails and variable conditions throughout the mountain. Snowmaking continues on Cruiser, Sleeper, Sugarbear Forest, and Riemergasse, using caution as conditions vary around snow guns and visibility is low. Mother Nature has some holiday gifts for us! Were expecting several snowy days during the holiday week, which could bring over 12 inches of fresh snow as we head into the New Year!

Tomorrow we'll be getting down on 401 skiable acres served by 9 lifts and 92 open trails. Ropes have dropped on loads of natural terrain, please use caution as coverage is very thin, due to wind and traffic, and suggested for experts only. Hiking for Castlerock is open from 10:00 AM - 3:00 PM, run outs for this terrain are extremely thin, use caution as conditions could damage equipment, experts only. Groomers will be pushing out snow mounds tonight on Lower Snowball and Spring Road, for smooth riding tomorrow.

Operations have switched back to weekday hours, which means GMX will load at 8:00 AM. Followed by all other scheduled lifts at 9:00 AM. Reminder, terrain off upper mountain lifts is for advanced skiers and riders. The Sugarbush Parks crew has assembled a wonderful freestyle setup at Mt. Ellen with 14 features and 2 jumps. Plus, Parks crew plans to start building features on Riemergasse late this week. Join us Dec 24th - Jan 1st, for our Holiday Week at Sugarbush, filled with skiing, riding, and festive events for the whole family. Check out all of our winter events!

All uphill travel routes are now open at both Lincoln Peak and Mt. Ellen, check out our uphill travel policy for more info. *Note: Lincoln Peak PM travel route will stop at top of Gate House, North Lynx terrain is currently closed.

Have an Ikon Base Pass? Come ski before 12/25 and earn a voucher for an unrestricted lift ticket for yourself to be used any day here for the rest of the season. Grab up to five of these tickets simply by skiing and riding here before Christmas. Don't miss out on all of our deals including 50% off December lodging through December 26th.
